summary: P0 Dashboard fixes verified - All features working correctly. Stat card navigation, date range filter, and dynamic attendance table columns all implemented and functional.

tests.expected: Navigate to /team with Research Unit tab active
tests.result: PASS - Navigates to /team, Research Unit tab selected with 8 teams displayed

tests.expected: Navigate to /team with Support Staff tab active
tests.result: PASS - Navigates to /team, Support Staff tab selected with 1 team (Administration) displayed

tests.expected: Navigate to /leave with approved status filter and history tab
tests.result: PASS - Navigates to /leave, Leave History tab active, Status filter set to 'Approved', shows 3 approved leaves

tests.expected: Navigate to /leave with pending status filter
tests.result: PASS - Navigates to /leave, Leave Request tab active, Status filter set to 'Pending', shows 5 pending requests

test.description: Date range filter fetches attendance records for selected period
test.result: PASS - Counts changed after applying date filter, data in table also updated to show January dates

context_for_next_testing_agent: All P0 Dashboard fixes have been verified and are working correctly. Stat cards navigate to correct pages with correct filters/tabs selected. Date range filter works and updates attendance counts. Table columns change dynamically based on selected attendance tab.
